info.title: Azure Load Testing
info.description: These APIs allow end users to create, view and run load tests using Azure Load Test Service.

patch.summary: Associate an App Component (Azure resource) to a test or test run.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name of the App Component, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: App Component model.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name of the App Component, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get App Component details by App Component name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name of the App Component, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get App Components for a test or a test run by its name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: [Required, if testId is not provided] Test run Id.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Configure server metrics for a test or test run

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name for server metrics, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Server metrics configuration model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get server metrics configuration by its name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name for server metrics, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete server metrics configuration by its name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name for server metrics, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

204.description: The server metrics configuration is deleted.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get server metrics configuration for a test or test run by its name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: [Required, if testId is not provided] Test run Id.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all default server metrics configuration for supported resource types.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all supported resource types for App Components(Azure resource types).

200.description: The supported resource types and metrics for server side metrics

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Create a new test or Update an existing test.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Load test model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test by its name.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get load test details by test name

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all load tests by the fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort on one of the field - lastModifiedDateTime, displayName, createdBy in (field asc/desc) format. eg: displayName asc.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter search based on searchable fields - testId, createdBy.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedStartTime
parameters.description: Start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedEndTime
parameters.description: End DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get the next page of response.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: Number of results in response.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

put.summary: Upload input file for a given test name. File size can't be more than 50 MB. Existing file with same name for the given test will be overwritten. File should be provided in the request body as multipart/form-data.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: Integer representation of the file type (0 = JMX_FILE, 1 = USER_PROPERTIES, 2 = ADDITIONAL_ARTIFACTS).

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The file to be uploaded.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test file by the file name.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete file by the file name for a test.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get the next page of response.

200.description: The URLs for the requested test files

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test run by its name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name of the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Create and start a new test run with the given name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name of the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: oldTestRunId
parameters.description: Existing test run Id that should be rerun.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Load test run model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test run details by name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name of load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test run file by file name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name of load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test run file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

200.description: The URL for the requested test run file

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all test runs with given filters

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort on one of the field - status, displayName, executedDateTime in (field asc/desc) format. eg: displayName asc.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get the next page of response.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter search based on searchable fields - description, executedUser.

parameters.name: executionFrom
parameters.description: The end DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: executionTo
parameters.description: The start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Comma separated list of test run status, value can be -  "ACCEPTED", "NOTSTARTED","PROVISIONING","PROVISIONED","CONFIGURING",
"CONFIGURED","EXECUTING","EXECUTED","DEPROVISIONING","DEPROVISIONED","DONE","CANCELLED","FAILED".

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: Number of results in response.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name of the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

200.description: The requested test run is stopped. Call GET /testruns/{testRunId} to check the status.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

post.summary: Get all client metrics for a load test run.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name of the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Client metrics request model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all filters that are supported for client metrics for a given load test run

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

AppComponent.description: An Azure resource object (Refer azure generic resource model : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/resources/resources/get-by-id#genericresource)

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name of the Azure resource

subscriptionId.description: Subscription Id of the Azure resource

testId.description: [Required, if testRunId is not given] Load test unique identifier

testRunId.description: [Required if testId is not given] Load test run unique identifier

value.description: AppComponents Map { resource id (Fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}) : resource object }

testRunId.description: Test run name for which client metrics filters is required.

requestSamplers.description: List of request samplers, maximum supported samplers for queries are 20. In case of empty, it will return metrics for maximum 20 samplers

errors.description: List of errors, maximum supported errors for queries are 20. In case of empty, by default will return metrics for maximum 20 errors

percentiles.description: List of percentiles values for response time, supported values 50,90,99,95. Default value is 50th percentile.

groupByInterval.description: For test duration less than 10 minutes group by time interval can be any one of 5s,10s,1m,5m.\n\nFor test duration greater than 10 minutes, group by time interval can be any one of 1m,5m,1h. Default value is 1m.

testRunId.description: Test run name for which client metrics results is required.

defaultMetrics.description: Default metrics map {resourceType : list of metrics config} (Refer for metrics structure: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition)

ErrorResponseBody.description: The definition of an error object.

FileType.description: Integer representation of the file type (0 = JMX_FILE, 1 = USER_PROPERTIES, 2 = ADDITIONAL_ARTIFACTS)

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of file URLs, if applicable

requestSamplerValues.description: List of request sampler for the test run, for which client metrics can be filtered.

errorFiltersValues.description: List of errors occurred for the test run, for which client metrics can be filtered.

InputTestArtifacts.description: The input artifacts for the test.

additionalUrls.description: The input artifacts file { name : url } map for the test run.

engineInstances.description: The number of engine instances to execute load test. Supported values are in range of 1-45. Required for creating a new test.

splitAllCSVs.description: Whether all the input CSV files should be split evenly across all engines.

OutputTestArtifacts.description: The output artifacts for the test run.

PassFailCriteria.description: Pass fail criteria for a test.

passFailMetrics.description: Map of id and pass fail metrics { id  : pass fail metrics }.

clientmetric.description: The client metric on which the criteria should be applied. Allowed values - response_time_ms , latency, error, requests, requests_per_sec.

aggregate.description: The aggregation function to be applied on the client metric. Allowed functions - percentage - for error metric ,avg, p50, p90, p95, p99, min, max - for response_time_ms and latency metric, avg - for requests_per_sec, count - for requests.

requestName.description: Request name for which the Pass fail criteria has to be applied.

value.description: The value to compare with the client metric. Allowed values - error : [0.0 , 100.0] unit- % , response_time_ms and latency : any integer value unit- ms.

action.description: Either stop or continue after the threshold is met. Default is continue.

actualValue.description: The actual value of the client metric for the test run.

result.description: Outcome of the test run. possible outcome - passed , failed , undetermined.

ResourceMetricModel.description: Associated metric definition for particular metrics of the azure resource ( Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition).

value.description: The value of the secret, of type AKV_SECRET_URI or SECRET_VALUE

testId.description: [Required, if testRunId is not given] Load test unique identifier

testRunId.description: [Required, if testId is not given] Load test run unique identifier

metrics.description: Metrics map {metric id : metrics object} (Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition for metric id).

SupportedResourceType.description: Supported azure resource types for App Component like Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests, Microsoft.ClassicCompute, Microsoft.ClassicStorage etc. (Refer for full list of available resource types in azure : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/resource-providers-and-types, some of them we are supporting for server side metrics configuration).

createdDateTime.description: The created DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test model.

createdBy.description: The user that created the test model.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test model.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user that last modified the test model.

secrets.description: Secrets can be stored in an Azure Key Vault or any other secret store. If the secret is stored in an Azure Key Vault, the value should be the secret identifier and the type should be AKV_SECRET_URI. If the secret is stored elsewhere, the secret value should be provided directly and the type should be SECRET_VALUE.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run.

keyvaultReferenceIdentityType.description: Type of the managed identity referencing the Key vault.

keyvaultReferenceIdentityId.description: Resource Id of the managed identity referencing the Key vault.

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of resources in case of paginated results, if applicable

testRunId.description: Unique test run name as identifier.

displayName.description: Display name of a test run.

startDateTime.description: The test run start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format).

endDateTime.description: The test run end DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format).

testResult.description: Test result for pass/Fail criteria used during the test run. possible outcome - Passed , Failed , Not Applicable.

vusers.description: Number of virtual users, for which test has been run.

createdDateTime.description: The created DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test run.

createdBy.description: The user that created the test run.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last updated  DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test run.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user that updated the test run.

secrets.description: Secrets can be stored in an Azure Key Vault or any other secret store. If the secret is stored in an Azure Key Vault, the value should be the secret identifier and the type should be AKV_SECRET_URI. If the secret is stored elsewhere, the secret value should be provided directly and the type should be SECRET_VALUE.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run.

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of resources in case of paginated results, if applicable

startTime.description: start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) for the requested client metrics filter.

endTime.description: end DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) for the requested client metrics filter.

TestIdQueryParameter.name: testId
TestIdQueryParameter.description: Unique name for load test, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

TestIdPathParameter.name: testId
TestIdPathParameter.description: Unique name for load test, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

Endpoint.name: Endpoint
Endpoint.description: URL to perform data plane API operations on the resource.

scopes.https://loadtest.azure-dev.com/.default: OAuth2 scope for Azure Load Test Service
